title: 24｜ComfyUI基本操作与工作流
content:
1. ComfyUI 获取：
  • ComfyUI 官方仓库：https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI
  • ComfyUI 官方整合包：https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/releases
  1. ComfyUI 官方范例：https://comfyanonymous.github.io/ComfyUI_examples/
  2. 参考范例 Img2Img：https://comfyanonymous.github.io/ComfyUI_examples/img2img/
  3. 推荐工作流参考：
  • https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI_examples
  • https://openart.ai/workflows/home
  • https://comfyworkflows.com/workflows
